bad_request_400.name: Bad Request
bad_request_400.description: There is no content in request

unauthorized_403.name: Unauthorized
unauthorized_403.description: Unauthorized users cannot create, update or delete messages

not_found_error_404.name: Not found
not_found_error_404.description: Not found the resource with requested URL.

method_not_allowed_405.name: Method Not Allowed
method_not_allowed_405.description: The method is not allowed for the requested URL.
